rti.h File Reference
IP » RTI

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of RTI. This also contains some related macros. More...

#include <ti/csl/cslr_rti.h>

 Maximum possible preload value for RTI DWD counter(2^25).

Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of RTI. This also contains some related macros.
